Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Analyzing the Data and Schema: Schema: order_event_log: case_id, event_id, activity, timestamp, resource, additional_info. orders: case_id, customer_id, order_type, order_value. resources: resource_id, role, department. Assumed Normal Flow: 1. Register Order 2. Perform Credit Check 3. Validate Stock 4. Confirm Shipment 5. Ship Goods 6. Issue Invoice 7. Receive Payment. Analyzing Case 1001: follows standard happy path. Analyzing Case 1002: Confirm Shipment and Ship Goods before Credit Check and Validate Stock, Credit Check and Validate Stock after shipping. Analyzing Case 1003: Ship Goods before Confirm Shipment, missing Validate Stock. Analyzing Case 1004: Receive Payment before Issue Invoice, missing Credit Check and Validate Stock, Confirm Shipment with shipment_scheduled=N but Ship Goods anyway.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Categorizing Anomalies: Sequence Deviations: Case 1002 Confirm Shipment and Ship Goods before Credit Check Stock Validation, Credit Check Stock Validation after, Case 1003 Ship Goods before Confirm Shipment, Case 1004 Payment before Invoice. Missing Activities: Case 1003 missing Validate Stock, Case 1004 missing Perform Credit Check Validate Stock. Resource Role Mismatches: potential authorization issues.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Hypothesizing Causes: Case 1002 Rush Order Priority Handling: orders table priority order, skipping Credit Check until after shipping, bypass mechanism ship now check later policy. Case 1003 Missing Stock Validation: system crash clerk forget drop ship scenario, warehouse acting autonomously. Case 1004 Pre payment Missing Checks: high value order payment immediately, prepaid scenario skip credit checks, invoice after payment odd, data quality issue forced shipment.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Developing SQL Queries: Goal 1 Detect Out of Order Events: cases where Ship Goods timestamp earlier than Perform Credit Check. Goal 2 Detect Missing Steps: cases have Ship Goods but lack Validate Stock. Goal 3 Investigate Priority vs Standard: sequence deviations correlate with order_type priority. Goal 4 Resource Analysis: resources performing out of order steps. Goal 5 Data Entry Timeliness: time differences between events.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Refining the SQL: Self joins for sequence checking, aggregation for missing steps. Double check specific anomalies in Case 1004: prepayment orders skip credit checks. Double check Case 1002: backfilling data logistics rushed finance catch up. Double check Case 1003: Confirm Shipment paperwork logged late.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Structure of the Output: sections Analysis of Anomalies, Hypotheses, SQL Investigation Queries. Use persona of data analyst process mining expert.
